
Results for CalcLogical()

8-bit operations
0x81 & 0x88 = 0x80
0x81 | 0x88 = 0x89
0x81 ^ 0x88 = 0x09

16-bit operations
0xf0f0 & 0x0ff0 = 0x00f0
0xf0f0 | 0x0ff0 = 0xfff0
0xf0f0 ^ 0x0ff0 = 0xff00

32-bit operations
0x87654321 & 0xf000f000 = 0x80004000
0x87654321 | 0xf000f000 = 0xf765f321
0x87654321 ^ 0xf000f000 = 0x7765b321

64-bit operations
0x00000000ffff00000000 & 0x00000000ffff00008888 = 0x00000000ffff00000000
0x00000000ffff00000000 | 0x00000000ffff00008888 = 0x00000000ffff00008888
0x00000000ffff00000000 ^ 0x00000000ffff00008888 = 0x00000000000000008888
